skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart heat
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is the companion skill for the EvoControl cloud-service that adds many features not native to the Honeywell/Resideo Evohome zoned heating control system (unaffiliated). It also works with the Round Connected thermostat. Currently, the feature-list includes Activities, Groups, Multiple Schedules, Schedule-Shifting, Graphing/Charting, plus Constrained Overrides. Using this skill requires that you have an EvoControl account which you have authorised to access Honeywell TCC. Visit https://smartskills.tech/ec/register to sign up. See https://smartskills.tech/evocontrol for screenshots and a detailed how-to.
